summary: This is a small fix, so that you can use the Mortar and Pestle from Campfire to create potions using the Alternate Alchemy method.
descriptionHtml:
There's not much to this mod, its pretty simple. Just sharing my own personal patch for anyone else who likes Campfire and Alternate Alchemy.Â 
Allows you to utilize the alchemy menu from Alternate Alchemy with the Mortar and Pestle offered by Campfire.
You can find links in the Mod Requirements section.

Cheers, MisterB.
author: MisterB1969
